ygData.subject: Bellow and Denon's
ygData.msgSnippet: Greetings Fellow Bards, I think this is the equation for Bellow...  ... 2 Try this out...Level divided by 2 plus 1. Ok as for Denons, does anybody have
ygData.messageBody:
Greetings Fellow Bards,

I think this is the equation for Bellow...

<level>
------- + 1 = Bellow hp
2


Try this out...Level divided by 2 plus 1.

Ok as for Denons, does anybody have any quantitative
values associated with that song. I have seen it do
large quantities of damage on some pretty tough
monsters. If I could get some numbers then I can
probably evaluate the usefullness of this song, versus
Bellow.

Thanks all,

Sedaien Reyvon
lvl 21 Bard
Solusek Ro
